physicalTable.name: SAMP_OFFICES_D
physicalTable.description: Offices dimension table : Stores office dimension attribute information

physicalColumns.name: Sequence
physicalColumns.description: Sequence: Stores sequence as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Organization
physicalColumns.description: Organization: Stores the Organization information as text

physicalColumns.name: Dept_Key
physicalColumns.description: Department Key: Stores department key as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Office_Key
physicalColumns.description: Office Key: Surrogate key of the office dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Department
physicalColumns.description: Department: Stores the department information as text

physicalColumns.name: Office_Dsc
physicalColumns.description: Office Description: Stores the office description as text

physicalColumns.name: Company_Key
physicalColumns.description: Company Key: Stores company key as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Org_Key
physicalColumns.description: Organization Key: Stores Organization key as an integer

physicalColumns.name: Address_Key
physicalColumns.description: Address Key: Joins to Address_Key of Addresses dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: Company
physicalColumns.description: Company: Stores the company information as text
